Questions.Question: Who said 'To be or not to be, that is the question'?
Questions.Explanation: This famous quote is from William Shakespeare's play 'Hamlet'.

Questions.Question: Which author wrote 'It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife'?
Questions.Explanation: This quote is the opening line of Jane Austen's novel 'Pride and Prejudice'.

Questions.Question: Who said 'The only way to do great work is to love what you do'?
Questions.Explanation: This quote is attributed to Steve Jobs, co-founder of Apple Inc.
